Introduction
This topic contains information about incarcerated Veterans who are entitled to both compensation and pension, including
paying compensation in lieu of pension during incarceration
, and
resuming the benefits of a Veteran entitled to both compensation and pension when incarceration ends
.
title: M21-1, Part VI, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section B - Paying Benefits to the Dependent(s) of an Incarcerated Veteran
citation: Part VI, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section B
